channel.title: Walt's Blog
channel.description: Just trying out fun and interesting tech

item.title: Learning about UI/UX
item.description: I learned a bit about UI/UX after showing people the original version of my site that was confusing to navigate.
item.author: wpniederer@gmail.com (Walt Niederer)

item.title: Trying out Scalr for Terraform
item.description: When I was researching various ways to handle my state files for Terraform and how to built them into a CI/CD pipeline, I came across Scalr - a cloud solution for Terraform.
item.author: wpniederer@gmail.com (Walt Niederer)

item.title: Hosting a Next.js blog in AWS
item.description: Time to talk about AWS and the infrastructure that makes this blog available to you!
item.author: wpniederer@gmail.com (Walt Niederer)

item.title: Developing a Website with Next.js
item.description: Next.js is a powerful framework, but there are some big caveats to consider if you aren't interested in hosting in Vercel.
item.author: wpniederer@gmail.com (Walt Niederer)

item.title: About this site
item.description: Talking about my goals for this site, as well as how I initially planned to build it.
item.author: wpniederer@gmail.com (Walt Niederer)
